dict.string: {bullets} Group Chat now features: Customized group names, avatars, and backgrounds. Supports up to 250 participants.{nextLine}{bullets} Public profiles allow Message+ users, including those who are not in your contacts, to see your name and avatar. Update your profile anytime within the Sidebar.{nextLine}{bullets} Typing Indicators, Delivery and Read Receipts.{nextLine}{bullets} Share photos, gifs and videos of larger size.{nextLine}{bullets} Faster messaging experience.
{bullets} Let the people who matter know when you're on your way Home using Glympse.{nextLine}{bullets} Use Yelp to find the best places to meet.
{bullets} Take a picture, video or gif.{nextLine}{bullets} Add stickers or doodles just because.{nextLine}{bullets} Share a Flipbook from gallery pictures.
Help Anihna Put Your Data To Work For You
